snippet.title: Battlefield 1 - Apocalypse Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Conquer the iconic, infamous battles of World War 1. The Battlefield 1 Apocalypse expansion pack is now available for Battlefield 1 Premium Pass owners. Go over the top today: http://x.ea.com/45026

With no end in sight, enter a living hell and participate in the most brutal battles of the cataclysmic Great War. Make use of new weapons, melee tools, and gadgets across 5 new maps.

Learn more about Battlefield 1 Apocalypse: http://x.ea.com/45027

Subscribe and be the first to see Battlefield 1 trailers and videos: http://bit.ly/270eMcA
